hanzi-su-wiki:
样

Значения

Вид; фасон. Образец; пример; образ; шаблон. Сч. слово

Мнемоника

Хороший образец хозяйства — много деревьев 木 и овец 羊.

Варианты

樣, 様

manner; pattern; way; appearance; shape; classifier: kind, type
манера; шаблон; путь; внешний вид; форма; классификатор: вид, тип
rtega_mnemonic:
樣樣RS
样样		shape, form, pattern, style
  • a sheeps ⺷/羊 hide left to dry on a wooden 木 structure for a long time 永 has a distinct shape or form
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 樣)
Pictophonetic: 羊 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
这样 [ zhè yàng ]: this kind of; so; this way; like this; such
一样 [ yī yàng ]: same; like; equal to; the same as; just like
怎样 [ zěn yàng ]: how; what kind
那样 [ nà yàng ]: that kind; that sort
同样 [ tóng yàng ]: same; equal; equivalent
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 羊 [ yáng ] sheep, goat
CONTEXT_sherlock:
一样same
现在，高明看起来很高兴，话很多，跟上午很不一样[4]。Now, Gao Ming looks very happy and talks a lot, very different from the morning [4].
他很想跟高明一样，很快就可以知道这个人是做什么的。He wanted to be like Gao Ming, and soon he would know what this person does.
这个叫刘路飞的人跟这个卷发公司的广告一样奇怪。”This person named Liu Lufei is as strange as the advertisement for this curly hair company. "
heisig_chinese_memo: This sheep tries to hide its appearance from the wolf by standing behind the tree.  Not a great strategy.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: For an eternity sheep have been providing wool to make clothes for humans and give them a nice appearance.  Furthermore, for an eternity humans have thought of trees as having a beautiful apprerance.

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 羊 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 1
Freq: 88
Chinese: This sheep tries to hide its appearance from the wolf by standing behind the tree. Not a great strategy.
Meaning: appearance
Hanzi: 樣
Story: For an eternity sheep have been providing wool to make clothes for humans and give them a nice appearance.  Furthermore, for an eternity humans have thought of trees as having a beautiful apprerance.  
Kind: simplified

样字的基本解释

样
（樣）
yàng
形状：样子。模样。图样。同样。装模作样。
种类：花样。各种各样。
做标准的东西：样板。样本。样品。榜样。

样字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàng］
［《集韻》弋亮切，去漾，以。］
“样1”的繁体字。
(1)形状。
(2)式样，标准。供人观看或模仿的东西。
(3)量词。表示事物的品类。
(4)抛掷。
[②]［xiàng］
［《集韻》似兩切，上養，邪。］
“样2”的繁体字。
橡实。即栎实。

样字的英文翻译

◎ 样
appearance, kind, sample, shape

样字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　样； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页524第03
【廣韻】與章切【集韻】餘章切，?音陽。【廣韻】槌也。【方言】懸蠶柱，自關而東謂之槌，齊謂之样。　又【集韻】徐羊切，音詳。又兹郞切，音臧。義?同。

（樣）【集韻】似兩切，音象。栩實。橡或作樣。詳橡字註。　又【集韻】弋亮切【韻會】餘亮切，?音漾。法也。【廣韻】作㨾。【唐書·柳公權傳】公權在元和閒書法有名，劉禹錫稱爲柳家新㨾。【長編】宋太祖謂陶穀曰：聞草制皆檢舊本，依樣畫葫蘆。【文獻通考】政和八年，令禮部造履三十副，下開封府舖戸爲樣。原作柳家新樣。
样字的源字形

样字的起名意思

：指形状；模样；种类；也指可以作为标准的东西。

kind

yàng

kind
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàng］
["Ji Yun" Yi Liang cut, go to Yang, to. ]
Traditional characters of "样1".
(1) Shape.
(2) Style and standard. Something for people to watch or imitate.
(3) Quantifiers. Represents the category of things.
(4) Throwing.
[②]［xiàng］
["Jiyun" is like two cuts, upper raising, evil. ]
Traditional characters of "样2".
Acorn. That is Quercus.

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　-like; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 524 No. 03
[Guang Yun] Cut with Zhang [Ji Yun] Yu Zhang cut,? Yin Yang. [Guang Yun] Hammer also. [Dialect] Hanging silkworm column, from Guan to the east is called the mallet, Qi is the same.　[Jiyun] Xu Yangqie, the sound is detailed. I'm here to cut again, Yin Zang. Righteous? Same. (Sample) [Jiyun] like two cuts, sound and image. Realistic. Oak or assembling. Detailed acorn note.　[Jiyun] Yi Liangqie [Yunhui] Yu Liangqie,? Yin Yang. Law also. [Guang Yun] For 㨾. [Tang Shu · Liu Gongquan Biography] Gongquan is famous in Yuan Hexian calligraphy, and Liu Yuxi is called Liu Jiaxin 㨾. [Long edition] Song Taizu said that Tao Gu said: When we hear the grass, we will check the old version and draw the gourd according to the pattern. [Document General Test] In the eighth year of Zhenghe, he ordered the Ministry of Rites to make 30 performances, like the shop under the Kaifeng Mansion. A new look from the original Liu family.
kind
Source glyph
kind
Name meaning
: Refers to shape; appearance; type; also refers to something that can be used as a standard.
形声字。从木(树),表示橡树的果实;兼(yang)声。简体字从木、羊(yang )声。本义是橡树的果实。假借指形状。

榜~。③种类:各~|同~「各种各~。

Первоначальное значение - плод дуба.
Под видом формы пальца.
①Форма: ~ суб "модель ~ | стиль ~. ②Стандарт: ~ продукт" ~ книга | взрыва ~.

yàng
1) образец, образчик; фасон, модель; проба; сорт, пример (также счётное слово); показательный, примерный, пробный
货样 образец товара
依样 по образцу
一共有三样东西 всего в наличии три (разных) предмета (вещи)
这样 такой; такого рода
走样 потерять вид; выйти за рамки
2) вид; способ; манера; стиль
巧样 искусные манеры
